greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of perfect divisors of n.
comment: Number of divisors d of n with sigma(d)=2*d (sigma=A000203); A080224(n)+a(n)+A080226(n)=A000005(n).
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Perfect Number.
program: a080225 n = length [d | d <- takeWhile (<= n) a000396_list, mod n d == 0]
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 07 2003
